#1. Introduction

#Data
```{r}
#Remove the column with NA.
train <- read_csv("train.csv")
train <- na.omit(train)
head(train, n=9)
```
As a customer shops an insurance policy, he/she will receive a number of quotes with different coverage options before purchasing a plan. From the data above, a customer with ID 10000000 recieved nine quote and purchased the last one.

```{r}
#Select quotes which customer purchased
purchase <- train[train$record_type=="1", ]
head(purchase, n=3)

ggplot(purchase, aes(x=shopping_pt)) +geom_bar()

```
